_header: Who would do well he must begin at well
_description: Verses exhorting reader to do well — one stanza rhyme royal, preceding 6526

Banna.First Lines:
Quho wald do weill he mon begin at weillfor to do weill and nocht
                    at wantour will…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Seik weill at weill and vyis þe voundir weilconclud with
                    weill and thow sall fair full weill
